title: System Dynamics-Based Engineering Education Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in engineering fields and understanding of basic systems thinking
context.additional_context: Integrated competency development program for current practitioners, applying the 4DDD framework linking cognitive, psychomotor, social, and affective domains.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causal relationships among variables within engineering learning systems using system dynamics modeling
Learners can generate three or more multidisciplinary engineering education design scenarios by applying the 4DDD tool
Learners demonstrate the ability to integrate cognitive and psychological elements while designing microlearning modules in mobile environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
